our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.content:
# The Bliss Home Journey

Founded in 2020, Bliss Home emerged from a passion for creating spaces that inspire and comfort. Our journey began when our founder, Sarah Chen, recognized the need for thoughtfully curated home d√©cor that combines luxury with accessibility.

## Our Philosophy

At Bliss Home, we believe that every home tells a story. Our carefully selected pieces are designed to help you write yours. We work directly with artisans and designers who share our commitment to quality, sustainability, and timeless beauty.

## Our Commitment

We're dedicated to:
- Sustainable sourcing
- Fair trade practices
- Supporting local artisans
- Exceptional customer service

## Looking Forward

As we continue to grow, our mission remains unchanged: to help you create spaces that reflect your personal style and bring joy to everyday living.

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.content:
# Shipping Policy

## Delivery Options

### Standard Shipping
- 5-7 business days
- Free for orders over $150
- $9.95 for orders under $150

### Express Shipping
- 2-3 business days
- $24.95 flat rate

### White Glove Delivery
- Available for large furniture items
- Includes assembly and packaging removal
- Pricing varies by location

## International Shipping
Currently available to Canada and select European countries. Rates calculated at checkout.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.content:
# Returns Policy

## 30-Day Return Window
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your order, you can return it within 30 days of delivery.

## Return Conditions
- Items must be unused and in original packaging
- Original receipt or proof of purchase required
- Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer
- Store credit or refund to original payment method

## Non-Returnable Items
- Custom orders
- Final sale items
- Personal care items
- Opened packaging
